content: we have 50+ issues that assigned to (newer) contributors via rustbot (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/assigned/rustbot), but it seems some of them have no progress. It'd be great if we could ping assignee and/or release assignment if they seem busy so that other contributors can work on it instead. Could this be one of triage work?
yeah sounds good. I generally sweep to find old ones and unclaim/unassign them.

we discussed this in the meeting on 05.08 and one of the members is assigned to doing this. They will ping the assigned author askign for an update, and unassign if there is no progress or author wishes not to continue.
